references.paper_title: BEHAVE: Dataset and method for tracking human object interactions
references.reason: This paper is foundational for understanding human-object interaction datasets and methods, crucial for the context of human motion generation.

references.paper_title: Executing your commands via motion diffusion in latent space
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to motion generation using diffusion models in latent space, a technique relevant to the paper's core methodology.

references.paper_title: Interfusion: Text-driven generation of 3d human-object interaction
references.reason: This paper focuses on text-driven 3D human-object interaction generation, directly related to the paper's text-to-motion generation task.

references.paper_title: Deep whole-body control: learning a unified policy for manipulation and locomotion
references.reason: This work addresses whole-body control, offering insights into the underlying physics and control principles relevant to the paper's physics optimization module.

references.paper_title: Momask: Generative masked modeling of 3d human motions
references.reason: This paper proposes a generative masked model for 3D human motion, a model type the current paper compares against and improves upon.
